data.title: Black Seed Bagels
data.meta_description: Black Seed was conceived by two friends from two cities. United by a love of traditional bagel baking and artisanal ingredients, the pair sought to combine the best of their native Montreal and New York styles, and create a bagel that is truly unique and delicious.
data.text:
BAGEL LOYALTY

Earn points with every order when you order in-store or online.

GET THE APP NOW

NATIONWIDE SHIPPING

Fresh-frozen bagels, made to order, shipped directly to your doorstep.

ORDER NOW

BEER + BAGEL COLLAB

Weekender Lemon Basil is now available in all NYC Talea Taprooms.

LEARN MORE

CATER YOUR NEXT EVENT WITH BAGELS!

Let us bring our James-Beard nominated bagels to your next meeting, gathering and event. We offer easy catering packages as well as full custom planning.

Order Now

FIND US FROZEN

You can now buy our frozen bagels at select Whole Foods Markets and on Fresh Direct in NYC!

WHERE TO BUY
